charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1101_01:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking in
town one day...
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_03: Whoa there! Sorry I startled you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_05:
Ha ha ha!
Voltorb gave you a good shock, didn’t it?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_06: Sorry, kid! It wasn’t on purpose!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_08: You got some backbone, don’t you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_09: Voltorb didn’t scare you? That’s pretty rare!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_10:
My Voltorb here got spooked by you
and used Self Destruct.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_11:
It can be kind of jumpy sometimes. Volatile, even.
Maybe I should call it Volat-orb instead!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_12:
But on the other hand, that is what makes
Voltorb so strong at the same time.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_13:
Being afraid is what keeps you alive in
survival situations!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_15:
Great question! Consider this: Being unafraid
means being unalert, right?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0302_16: Are you always nervous, too, then?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_17:
Ha ha ha! Of course I am!
No less than Voltorb here!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_18:
A little moment of relaxation can spell the
end on the battlefield!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_19:
So, soldiers who stay on their toes 
live the longest!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_20:
The most important thing is thinking of how to
make negatives into positives.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_21:
Whoa! What’s going on, Voltorb? I’m feeling 
a lot of fighting spirit coming from you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_23: Looks like you sparked Voltorb’s competitiveness!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_25: No! It looks like it just wants to challenge you!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_27:
But if it wants to battle you, you must be
pretty impressive.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_28:
My objective at the PML is to battle strong Trainers
like you...
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_29:
and crank up Voltorb’s potential to 11 so that it
can have even greater electric power!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0401_33:
I won’t lose, either!
Let’s make this a tingling battle!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0402_36:
Right back at you, kid!
Let’s make this an electrifying battle!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_1201_37:
Oh no! Your fighting spirit is getting Voltorb
too excited!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2301_0302_40: We gotta get out of here!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_01:
Lt. Surge, I understand you are a warrior with
many battles under your belt, and I respect that.
Would you do me the honor of battling you?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_02:
Ooh! I like your fighting spirit, buddy!
You’re making me feel all tingly!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_03:
Sure thing, pal!
I’ll show you what being a soldier is all about!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_1201_04:
I’ll show you the results of my training then.
You better not underestimate a martial artist’s
drive to win!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0101_01: Ha! You think you can keep up with my Voltorb?
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0101_02:
No more need for words...
Let’s make this a nice clean fight.
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_01:
Such a strong will to win...
Such determination to not fail!
I could feel it from each blow you delivered!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_02:
You may appear fearless, but you are in fact
cautious and calm as you observe the battle and
formulate your strategy. So masterful!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_03:
Well, look who’s talking!
You were a shock to the system yourself!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_04:
While we may seem like we have similar styles,
we’re actually completely different! I can’t wait
to battle you again sometime!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_05:
Whoa, Voltorb! What’s going on?
Are you evolving?!
charaepi_ch0035_00_matthies/2311_0501_06:
I’m proud of you, soldier!
Now we’ll be even more electrifying!
